content.question: Five resistors and a battery are connected in a circuit, as shown in the figure. The currents in several circuit branches are as indicated. What is the magnitude of the current in Resistor <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="3 amps" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>
<math alttext="6 amps" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>
<math alttext="9 amps" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>9</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>
<math alttext="12 amps" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="9 amps" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>9</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
